commentary: Mathews to Shahid Afridi, FOUR runs A hundred after nearly five years. One of the very best ODI tons. Ever. And a nice way to bring it up. It was a short-of-length delivery outside off and he opened the bat-face and cut it to backward point boundary. There was no violence it. Just like this innings. You might look at the strike rate and think he went berserk but he didn't. It was a special knock. He went after Murali with some calculated agression. Almost out-of-character innings. He has rarely shown this patience. Afridi last scored a century in 2005, against India in Kanpur.

A special innings took a very good delivery and a special catch to come to an end.

commentary: Malinga to Shoaib Akhtar, OUT What an awesome slower one delivery from Malinga! For sure, Shoaib wasn't expecting. He was probably thinking of a yorker. Even a bouncer. And there comes a lovely loopy dipping slower one. Shoaib is stunned, gets forward and just pushes out at it. Checks his shot. And the ball lobs towards mid-off. Malinga roars. And they then they were one. What a game this has been. What will happen now? Oh what drama. What a roller-coaster ride. What tension

commentary: Malinga to Mohammad Asif, OUT Would you believe it? Malinga had one delivery at Asif. Just one delivery. It was to be the end of his spell. And what does he do? He fires it on a length, it lands on the middle and it moves towards off and middle line. Asif didn't have the skill to cope with it. His back leg was moving towards leg stump even as he stabbed in thin air. Leather on wood. Clatter! Game over! Spare a thought for Shahid Afridi. What a great innings it was but he had to finish up on the losing side.
